entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Shell] Shell currently doesn't detect pushed pages inside a Modal NavigationPage #6927
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Resources path in Maui should always use / and not the escape character \ which is Windows only #6926
  • .NET MAUI Shell - FlyoutItem - on Windows platform changing IsVisible property binding from false to true adds flyoutitem without visible title #6925
  • .NET MAUI Shell - FlyoutItem - Icon displays on Windows platform but not on Android platform #6924
  • Documented use of AutomationProperties.LabeledBy doesn't work with CollectionView #6920
  • #if WINDOWS not working correctly when referencing code in a separate Maui project #6919
  • Image cannot display device picture. #6918
  • [Entry] Cursor makes undesired jumps #6916

Closed

  • IImage - Exporting portrait JPG photos on Android rotates them #6915
  • Sample counter app is broken on macOS Monterey 12.3.1 (Xcode version 13.2.1 ) #6914
  • RC1 - DeviceStateTrigger Device not work #6366
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [Android] Button in FlexLayout not clickable #3435
    6.0.300
  • Cannot hide tab bar or change flyout display options #5932
    6.0.300
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File #5808
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout inside ScrollView doesn't size correctly #5755
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Android Image Aspect issues #2741
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Image sizing is not working as expected #2213
    6.0.300
  • ScrollView does not scroll with Flexlayout as a child #6881
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] CollectionView ItemSource bound to ObservableCollection not updating on collection update #2045
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6923
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.1 to 0.11.2 #6921
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Core] Fix crash in DeviceStateTrigger #6853
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, fatal, 6.0.300
  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for MAUI Essentials #6907
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] [Shell] Fix Flyout Background so it gets set in Locked behavior mode #6901
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300

Updated

  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y
  • Change iOS Shell pop to just use GotoAsync #6912
    6.0.300
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲
  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Add Windows Icon to .exe and set Window Icon at runtime #6900
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300
